verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump] [V: made] [ARG1: the decision to meet with Kim Jong Un based on a letter he did n't even read] . Trump announced on Friday that he would meet with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un on June 12 in Singapore after all . He decided the summit was back on after meeting with a North Korean envoy who came to deliver a letter from Kim . The two leaders have been swapping letters in recent weeks , and apparently their pen pal relationship has paid off — Trump ...
